```{=html}
<style>
.cv-container {
  max-width: 900px;
  margin: 0 auto;
  padding: 2rem;
}

.cv-header {
  text-align: center;
  margin-bottom: 3rem;
  padding: 2rem;
  background: linear-gradient(135deg, #667eea 0%, #764ba2 100%);
  border-radius: 15px;
  color: white;
  box-shadow: 0 10px 30px rgba(0,0,0,0.2);
}

.cv-name {
  font-size: 3rem;
  font-weight: 700;
  margin-bottom: 0.5rem;
  text-shadow: 2px 2px 4px rgba(0,0,0,0.3);
}

.cv-title {
  font-size: 1.5rem;
  font-weight: 300;
  margin-bottom: 1rem;
  opacity: 0.9;
}

.cv-contact {
  display: flex;
  justify-content: center;
  gap: 2rem;
  flex-wrap: wrap;
  margin-top: 1rem;
}

.cv-contact a {
  color: white;
  text-decoration: none;
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  gap: 0.5rem;
  padding: 0.5rem 1rem;
  background: rgba(255,255,255,0.1);
  border-radius: 25px;
  transition: all 0.3s ease;
  backdrop-filter: blur(10px);
}

.cv-contact a:hover {
  background: rgba(255,255,255,0.2);
  transform: translateY(-2px);
}

.cv-section {
  margin-bottom: 3rem;
}

.cv-section-title {
  font-size: 2rem;
  font-weight: 600;
  margin-bottom: 1.5rem;
  color: #ff8800;
  border-bottom: 3px solid #ff8800;
  padding-bottom: 0.5rem;
  position: relative;
}

.cv-section-title::after {
  content: '';
  position: absolute;
  bottom: -3px;
  left: 0;
  width: 50px;
  height: 3px;
  background: linear-gradient(90deg, #ff8800, #ff6600);
}

.experience-item {
  background: rgba(255, 136, 0, 0.05);
  border-left: 4px solid #ff8800;
  padding: 1.5rem;
  margin-bottom: 1.5rem;
  border-radius: 0 10px 10px 0;
  transition: all 0.3s ease;
}

.experience-item:hover {
  background: rgba(255, 136, 0, 0.1);
  transform: translateX(5px);
  box-shadow: 0 5px 15px rgba(255, 136, 0, 0.2);
}

.job-title {
  font-size: 1.3rem;
  font-weight: 600;
  color: #2c3e50;
  margin-bottom: 0.5rem;
}

.company-info {
  font-size: 1rem;
  color: #ff8800;
  font-weight: 500;
  margin-bottom: 0.5rem;
}

.job-period {
  font-size: 0.9rem;
  color: #7f8c8d;
  font-style: italic;
  margin-bottom: 1rem;
}

.job-description {
  margin-bottom: 1rem;
  line-height: 1.6;
}

.job-achievements {
  list-style: none;
  padding: 0;
}

.job-achievements li {
  margin-bottom: 0.75rem;
  padding-left: 1.5rem;
  position: relative;
  line-height: 1.5;
}

.job-achievements li::before {
  content: "▶";
  color: #ff8800;
  position: absolute;
  left: 0;
  font-size: 0.8rem;
}

.skills-grid {
  display: grid;
  grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fit, minmax(300px, 1fr));
  gap: 1.5rem;
}

.skill-category {
  background: linear-gradient(135deg, rgba(102, 126, 234, 0.1), rgba(118, 75, 162, 0.1));
  padding: 1.5rem;
  border-radius: 10px;
  border: 1px solid rgba(102, 126, 234, 0.2);
}

.skill-category-title {
  font-weight: 600;
  color: #f80;
  margin-bottom: 0.75rem;
  font-size: 1.1rem;
}

.skill-list {
  color: #2c3e50;
  line-height: 1.6;
}

.education-item {
  background: rgba(255, 136, 0, 0.05);
  border-left: 4px solid #ff8800;
  padding: 1.5rem;
  margin-bottom: 1rem;
  border-radius: 0 10px 10px 0;
}

.degree {
  font-size: 1.2rem;
  font-weight: 600;
  color: #2c3e50;
  margin-bottom: 0.5rem;
}

.institution {
  color: #ff8800;
  font-weight: 500;
  margin-bottom: 0.25rem;
}

.location-year {
  color: #7f8c8d;
  font-size: 0.9rem;
  font-style: italic;
}

.profile-section {
  background: linear-gradient(135deg, rgba(102, 126, 234, 0.05), rgba(118, 75, 162, 0.05));
  padding: 2rem;
  border-radius: 15px;
  border: 1px solid rgba(102, 126, 234, 0.1);
  font-size: 1.1rem;
  line-height: 1.7;
  margin-bottom: 2rem;
}

.languages-section {
  text-align: center;
  padding: 1.5rem;
  background: linear-gradient(135deg, rgba(255, 136, 0, 0.1), rgba(255, 102, 0, 0.1));
  border-radius: 10px;
  font-size: 1.2rem;
  font-weight: 500;
  color: #2c3e50;
}

@media (max-width: 768px) {
  .cv-name {
    font-size: 2rem;
  }
  
  .cv-contact {
    flex-direction: column;
    align-items: center;
  }
  
  .skills-grid {
    grid-template-columns: 1fr;
  }
}
</style>
```

<li>Led the <a href="https://data.unicef.org/resources/ictgenderdivide/" target="_blank">UNICEF Report on Bridging the Digital Gender Divide</a>, leveraging large-scale data and advanced statistical methods, including mixed-effect models, to advocate for equitable programs in digital skill acquisition.</li>

<li>Standardized complex survey data through data harmonization and using version control (Git and GitHub), improving the production of child well-being estimates.</li>

<li>Supervised a team of 3 analysts in the development of analytical tools to collect data on quality of learning amongst children.</li>
